text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer While you & the Democrat party was impeaching President Trump, the coronavirus was "making ground." If you had it "your way,"we would still be having "hearings and testimonies" in Congress while risking American lives threaten by the virus. You & your party should be embarrassed
